data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Magalhães, Célio, Lara, Luis Rólier, Wehrtmann, Ingo S. (2010): A new species of freshwater crab of the genus Allacanthos Smalley, 1964 (Crustacea, Decapoda, Pseudothelphusidae) from southern Costa Rica, Central America. Zootaxa 2604: 52-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.197643
